snippet.title: Massacre at the Mirage - Official Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
Learn more about the terrifying night that awaits you in this new trailer for Massacre At The Mirage, an upcoming first-person horror survival game. Massacre At The Mirage will be available on PC on October 28, 2024. Step into The Mirage cinema and face a chilling nightmare, where staff and patrons must survive a masked killer's rampage.

#MassacreAtTheMirage #IndieHorrorShowcase #Gaming
